jobInfo.postDescription:
岗位职责：
1.负责车联后台产品全功能链路的测试质量保障工作
2.负责车联后台产品功能需求理解，测试执行，测试计划、测试方案、测试用例、测试报告编写及评审
3.负责需求缺陷报告，跟踪，复现，协助开发人员定位问题
4.负责搭建和管理维护车联后台测试环境
任职要求：
专科及以上学历，计算机科学与技术、软件工程等相关专业，2年以上软件测试经验
2.熟悉软件测试基础理论，测试方法，测试流程等
3.有车联后台相关测试经验为佳
4.熟悉TCP/IP、HTTP/HTTPS 、MQTT等网络协议
5.掌握linux操作系统基本命令，能在服务器排查问题
6.熟练掌握Postman、Jmeter、loadrunner等至少一种接口或性能测试工具，熟悉性能测试流程
7.有较强的问题定位能力和推动协调能力,有一定抗压能力，有主动学习意识，具备较强的逻辑思维能力

brandComInfo.introduce: MB SIM Technology Co., Ltd. which is located in Shanghai, P.R. China is a joint venture company of MBtech Group. The MBtech Group is a wohlly-owned subsidiary of Daimler Group and a globally active, internationally leading automotive engineering and consulting company. MBtech develops, integrates, and tests components, systems, modules and vehicles worldwide. In addition to the headquarter in Germany, the MBtech Group is represented at locations in Europe, North America and Asia. Combined with the service segments and expertise from global MBtech Group, the MB SIM Technology Co., Ltd. is offering dedicated and market oriented vehicle engineering, powertrain solutions, electronics solutions and consulting services along the entire value creation chain with local resources to customers in China and other Asian countries for their localization and adaptation.
